data.message: Fixed text overflow in 360 Auto-Construct Landing Page feature cards: Applied textGrowth: "fixed-width" property to enable proper text wrapping. Root cause was missing textGrowth property - width alone doesn't trigger wrapping in Pencil.
data.task: Fixed text overflow in 360 Auto-Construct Landing Page feature cards
data.outcome: Applied textGrowth: "fixed-width" property to enable proper text wrapping. Root cause was missing textGrowth property - width alone doesn't trigger wrapping in Pencil.
